BBEX3.A.FKP.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (comparable rates) for the euro in the Falkland Islands (Islas Malvinas) / EUR 1 = FKP ... (middle)
General: Fixed exchange rate (1:1) to the pound sterling.
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of the ECB's daily euro reference exchange rates for the pound sterling.
